import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getProduitsForClient } from '../redux/actions/actions' function NavBar() { return (
Barber-shop
) } function CardsProduits() { const [key, setKey] = useState(0) const state = useSelector(state => state.getProduct) if (state[key] !== undefined) console.log(state[key]) const card = state.map((user, key) => { if (user) { return (
{key}
Prix : {user.prix}
) } }) function SendCard({ key }) { return (
Envoyer le RV
Prix : {key}
Heure:
) } return (
{card}
) } export default function Produits() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(async () => { await dispatch(getProduitsForClient()) }, []) return (
) }
